title: Srila Prabhupada Mayapur, Oct 06, 1974
image_desc: A photo of a blue sky with fluffy white clouds, representing the air surrounding the Earth.
content: - Air is a mixture of gases that surrounds the Earth.
It is essential for life, as we breathe it to survive.
Air is invisible, but we can feel it when it moves, like wind.
narration: "Home sweet home," Yes very sweet. The whole day and night work. This is moh. He is working hard day and night. Their is not a single moment leisure and still, he's: "Sweet home". This is illusion.
